verbs.description: BERLIN ( AP ) — [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: suggests] [ARG1: crime in Germany is surging because of migration , causing a political backlash against the country 's leadership] . But he 's wrong
BERLIN ( AP ) — U.S. President Donald Trump suggests crime in Germany [V: is] surging because of migration , causing a political backlash against the country 's leadership . But he 's wrong
